name: 黃希敏
objective: 此課程旨在因應高階英語文學習者的需要，協助他們得到近乎英美人士的語言知識。詞彙學與詞彙語用學為一事（亦即真實世界溝通的詞彙使用方式）之兩面。此兩層面是適當理解與運用自然語言的關鍵。詞彙學討論語言的約定俗成模式，譬如無所不在的固定/習慣性表達以及妥貼的字詞搭配方式。另一方面，詞彙語用學是關於創新而主流、重複出現的詞彙變化模式。近年來成長迅速的詞彙語用學在於探究詞彙的流動性及其基底修辭功能，諸如意義窄化、擴充、演變、偏離、轉換等現象。經由此課程，學生將獲得包含詞彙單位及其意義聯想、指認、使用情境的知識層面。
schedule:
Week 01　　Introduction
Week 02　　Phraseology: The periphery and the heart of language
Week 03　　Phraseology and language pedagogy A
Week 04　　Phraseology and language pedagogy B
Week 05　　Essential collocations for learners of English A
Week 06　　Essential collocations for learners of English B
Week 07　　Why can’t you just leave it alone? A
Week 08 　　Why can’t you just leave it alone? B
Week 09 　　MIDTERM
Week 10 　　Phraseology and English for academic purposes
Week 11　　Multiword expressions and the digital turn
Week 12　　Compilation, formalization and presentation of biling. phraseology A
Week 13　　Compilation, formalization and presentation of biling. phraseology B
Week 14　　The phraseological patterns of high-frequency verbs in advanced English A
Week 15　　The phraseological patterns of high-frequency verbs in advanced English B
Week 16　　Phraseology in language learning and teaching: Where to from here?
Week 17 　　Review
Week 18　　FINAL
scorePolicy:
1. Class participation and discussion  30%
2. Individual presentation of Lexical Pragmatics reading  30%
3. Midterm + Final  40%
